overview: The film stars the adorable Dominic, the 3 year old brother of Dean. Dad and Mom helped out. It's a simple narrative. A 3 year old gets a call. So he suits up in his Fireman suit and rushes to a fire to save the day. The soundtrack was Dean's avant-garde vision using Garage Band. Granted, it's not the easiest thing to listen to -- you can always turn down the volume.
title: Fireman Dominic
